actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A concurrent resolution recognizing April as Fair Housing Month.

summary.text: Recognizes the month of April as Fair Housing Month and that the Congress rededicates itself to the practice of the letter and spirit of the fair housing law.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution recognizing April as Fair Housing Month.
